notional.translation[0].definitions[0].d: existing only as an idea or plan, and not existing in reality
notional.translation[0].definitions[0].e: Their calculations were based on a notional minimum wage.
notional.translation[1].definitions[0].d: a notional amount, price, rent etc is not real but is guessed at or used as an example
notional.translation[1].definitions[0].e: an amount which had been based on the notional values of the homes which they occupied
